Class ProjectController

java.lang.Object
controller.ProjectController
public class ProjectController extends Object
Controller for managing project data and operations.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ProjectController(ProjectDB projectDB, UserDB userDB)
    Constructs a new ProjectController with references to the project and user databases.

  • Constructor Details

    • ProjectController

      public ProjectController(ProjectDB projectDB, UserDB userDB)
      Constructs a new ProjectController with references to the project and user databases.
      Parameters:
      projectDB - The project database
      userDB - The user database

  • Method Details

    • createProject

      public boolean createProject(String projectName, String neighborhood, int twoRoomUnits, int threeRoomUnits, LocalDate applicationOpeningDate, LocalDate applicationClosingDate, String managerNric, int availableOfficerSlots)
      Creates a new project in the system.
      Parameters:
      projectName - The name of the project
      neighborhood - The neighborhood of the project
      twoRoomUnits - The number of 2-Room units
      threeRoomUnits - The number of 3-Room units
      applicationOpeningDate - The opening date for applications
      applicationClosingDate - The closing date for applications
      managerNric - The NRIC of the manager in charge
      availableOfficerSlots - The number of available HDB officer slots
      Returns:
      true if the project was created, false if project name already exists

    • updateProject

      public boolean updateProject(String projectName, String neighborhood, int twoRoomUnits, int threeRoomUnits, LocalDate applicationOpeningDate, LocalDate applicationClosingDate, int availableOfficerSlots)
      Updates an existing project in the system.
      Parameters:
      projectName - The name of the project
      neighborhood - The neighborhood of the project
      twoRoomUnits - The number of 2-Room units
      threeRoomUnits - The number of 3-Room units
      applicationOpeningDate - The opening date for applications
      applicationClosingDate - The closing date for applications
      availableOfficerSlots - The number of available HDB officer slots
      Returns:
      true if the project was updated, false if project name not found

    • deleteProject

      public boolean deleteProject(String projectName)
      Deletes a project from the system.
      Parameters:
      projectName - The name of the project to delete
      Returns:
      true if the project was deleted, false if project name not found

    • getProject

      public Project getProject(String projectName)
      Gets a project by name.
      Parameters:
      projectName - The name of the project to get
      Returns:
      The project, or null if not found

    • getAllProjects

      public List<Project> getAllProjects()
      Gets all projects in the system.
      Returns:
      A list of all projects

    • getAllVisibleProjects

      public List<Project> getAllVisibleProjects()
      Gets all visible projects.
      Returns:
      A list of all visible projects

    • getProjectsByManager

      public List<Project> getProjectsByManager(String managerNric)
      Gets all projects created by a specific manager.
      Parameters:
      managerNric - The NRIC of the manager
      Returns:
      A list of projects created by the manager

    • getProjectsByOfficer

      public List<Project> getProjectsByOfficer(String officerNric)
      Gets all projects handled by a specific officer.
      Parameters:
      officerNric - The NRIC of the officer
      Returns:
      A list of projects handled by the officer

    • getVisibleProjectsByMaritalStatus

      public List<Project> getVisibleProjectsByMaritalStatus(boolean isMarried)
      Gets all projects that are open for applications by a specific marital status.
      Parameters:
      isMarried - Whether to filter for married applicants
      Returns:
      A list of visible projects suitable for the marital status

    • toggleProjectVisibility

      public boolean toggleProjectVisibility(String projectName, boolean visible)
      Toggles the visibility of a project.
      Parameters:
      projectName - The name of the project
      visible - Whether the project should be visible
      Returns:
      true if the visibility was toggled, false if project name not found

    • registerOfficerForProject

      public String registerOfficerForProject(String officerNric, String projectName)
      Registers an officer to handle a project.
      Parameters:
      officerNric - The NRIC of the officer
      projectName - The name of the project
      Returns:
      A registration ID if successful, null otherwise

    • approveOfficerRegistration

      public boolean approveOfficerRegistration(String registrationId, String officerNric, String projectName)
      Approves an officer's registration to handle a project.
      Parameters:
      registrationId - The ID of the registration
      officerNric - The NRIC of the officer
      projectName - The name of the project
      Returns:
      true if the registration was approved, false otherwise

    • rejectOfficerRegistration

      public boolean rejectOfficerRegistration(String registrationId)
      Rejects an officer's registration to handle a project.
      Parameters:
      registrationId - The ID of the registration
      Returns:
      true if the registration was rejected, false otherwise

    • decrementFlatTypeUnits

      public boolean decrementFlatTypeUnits(String projectName, FlatType flatType)
      Decrements the number of units for a specific flat type in a project.
      Parameters:
      projectName - The name of the project
      flatType - The flat type to decrement
      Returns:
      true if successful, false if no more units available

    • incrementFlatTypeUnits

      public boolean incrementFlatTypeUnits(String projectName, FlatType flatType)
      Increments the number of units for a specific flat type in a project.
      Parameters:
      projectName - The name of the project
      flatType - The flat type to increment
      Returns:
      true if successful, false if project not found

    • filterByNeighborhood

      public List<Project> filterByNeighborhood(List<Project> projects, String neighborhood)
      Filters projects by neighborhood.
      Parameters:
      projects - The list of projects to filter
      neighborhood - The neighborhood to filter by
      Returns:
      A filtered list of projects

    • filterByFlatType

      public List<Project> filterByFlatType(List<Project> projects, FlatType flatType)
      Filters projects by flat type availability.
      Parameters:
      projects - The list of projects to filter
      flatType - The flat type to filter by
      Returns:
      A filtered list of projects
